topic.para: &minvm; is a slimmed-down version of &sles; designed to act as a foundation for building systems for use in a data center, creating virtual application images, and building appliances.
Because &minvm; is based on &slsa;, it offers several important advantages right out of the box.

listitem.para: &minvm; can be customized by installing only packages required for the specific use case. This means that there are fewer packages to manage and patches to apply. The limited selection of packages also makes the system more secure by reducing the attack surface.
